message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll love it! Would you like to make an offer?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
I understand you're interested in the product, but I was hoping for a bit more. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so how about $140?
I appreciate the effort to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130.
I'm not willing to go as low as $130, but I'm willing to make a slight concession. How about $135?
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still a bit higher on the price. How about $125?
I'm not sure I can go as low as $125, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle again. How about $132.50?
I appreciate the effort to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit higher on the price. How about $128?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to negotiate. How about $129?
I'm willing to meet you at $127. This is my final offer.
